body.name: Dash Cam Front and Rear,8K Full UHD Dual Dash Camera for Cars, Dashcam with Night Vision with Free 32GB SD Card,Built-in Wi-Fi GPS,3.16”IPS Screen,170°Wide Angle,WDR,24H Parking Mode
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 1 hr 27 mins
features: 【8K Front and Rear Dash Cam】Ultra HD 8K(7680*4320) front camera +FHD 2.5K rear camera; Front wide Angle 170 degrees, rear wide Angle 140 degrees, to minimize blind spots. With 6 glass lenses + F1.8 aperture, it helps to get relatively clear video and images in low light conditions. Perfect for cars, trucks, SUVs, buses, easier to provide evidence when making insurance claims.

【Dash Camera for Cars 】Built-in GPS, real-time display of your driving position and speed, while in the video playback can record your driving route, location and speed. You can connect to our product APP via Wi-Fi to view your driving directions and location on Google Maps on your phone. These will provide further evidence at the time of the accident. Make your journey more rewarding.

【Dash Cam】The car camera comes with an app for iOS and Android smartphones, which can be obtained by scanning the QR information in the product manual; After downloading, you just need to connect your car camera to the smartphone app via WiFi to get live footage, download videos to your smartphone at speeds up to 10MBps, change Settings, edit and share your footage.

【Dash Camera】Includes a free U3 32GB SD memory card (up to 128GB). When the storage capacity on the memory card reaches its limit, new videos automatically overwrite the old ones. g sensors automatically detect sudden vibrations/collisions and lock the lens to prevent video from being overwritten, even during parking surveillance.

【Dash Cam Front and Rear】Dashcam with 24-hour parking monitoring function, need to purchase hardware kit to start (note: this product does not include hardware kit); The feature can be used when the car is turned off, and when the system detects a collision with the vehicle, it automatically turns on and records and locks the current video. Delay recording maintains low power consumption and low frame rate continuous recording, protecting the vehicle from theft or vandalism.

【Dash Cam】We have a complete pre-sales team, if you have any questions about this car camera, you can contact our team, we will answer any questions for you. We provide 7*24 hours technical support. (Note: If you need installation instructions, you can contact us directly, we will provide installation instructions and detailed installation instructions)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I recently installed the dual dash camera in my car, and it's been an absolute game-changer for my daily commutes and long-distance travels. This compact device offers crystal-clear footage from both the front and rear cameras, ensuring full coverage around my vehicle. The setup was straightforward, and the camera's interface is user-friendly.The video quality, both during the day and at night, is impressive, capturing details with precision. The wide-angle lenses provide extensive coverage without distortion. Moreover, the parking mode feature adds an extra layer of security while I'm away from my car.The only drawback I've noticed is the battery life when operating in parking mode for extended periods without a power source. However, considering the peace of mind and protection it offers, this is a minor issue.Overall, this dual dash camera is a reliable witness on the road, offering both safety and security. I highly recommend it to anyone looking to enhance their driving experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid dash cam to protect yourself
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I have been seeing a lot of videos online and reading articles about scams happening on the road like people jumping in front of cars, people slamming carts into cars and purposely causing accidents for insurance fraud. So, a dash cam was on top of our Christmas wish list. Plus, our car is older and does not have a back up rear camera so a dash cam with a back up camera would be ideal.After searching Amazon for a few months, we decided to try this one and are so glad we did!Key Positives* Video quality - the video quality is extremely wide and very clear and sharp. They aren’t kidding when they say 8k.* Memory card - We were surprised this dash cam came with a 32GB memory card. Other dash comes sell this separately which can be frustrating.* Easy set up - Set up was extremely easy. I set up the front camera without looking at the manual while my husband was driving. The rear camera was set up separately in minutes.* Stays on the dash - We live in Southern CA where the harsh sun beats down on our cars. The dash cam has stayed on without budging. The adhesive is strong!* Compact design - I like that the camera is relatively small and sleek. It does not distract the driver from seeing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very good product
reviews.reviewText: When I used this product, I was in a trying mood. Because I was not sure whether the tower was easy to use, but when I used it, I found that it was different from other driving recorders. It was very easy to operate. I could see the driving record with my mobile phone at any time, and the picture was very clear. really great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Connector not USB C!
reviews.reviewText: Was about to pull the trigger on this camera but noticed that the power connector is NOT USB C; very annoying! I already have a usb port available in my car so I won't be using the adapter to power the cam. On top of that, the power cable uses the very old-school USB-MINI - who makes stuff these days with USB-MINI!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars can't connect the viidure software to my phone
reviews.reviewText: one of the reasons i got this dashcam is to be able to download videos from the dashcam to my phone via wifi. the software does not connect to the dashcam easily....i can't put the password in as it has its own hardcoded password. it appears that 3 dash cam options pop up when my iphone SE 2nd Gen searches for wifi. it should be easy but it isn't and i can't get it to work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cam, best customer service
reviews.reviewText: The picture quality of this dashcam is particularly clear and the field of view is very wide. What makes me most satisfied is that their customer service is very responsible. When I have problems, they will reply and provide solutions in the first time. I would choose ovedisa again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful clear dash cam
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This dashcam has everything you need. The picture quality is very clear, whether it is day or night, you can clearly photograph the information of the vehicle in front of you.This is the best dashcam I've ever bought and I'm going to buy one for my other car.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and clear
reviews.reviewText: Clear vision in night time , I hired a guy to installed it because I like the wires to be hidden, so far so good without any problems.Clear image and so convenient it comes with a SD card already
